Explanation: The paragraph mentions the "maximum absorption peaks" of PCZDTB and their wavelengths (386 nm and 514 nm), which are clear material properties. Other words in the paragraph, such as "On the other hand," "were observed," and "in solution," do not refer to material properties and are not included in the table.
